interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Sunsonic Electric Razor, Rechargeable Electric Shaver with Pop Up Beard Trimmer, Type-C USB Mens Electric Razor. Review Date: 2020/06/22 Store: MDDM Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Brand': 'MDDM', 'Special Feature': 'Rechargeable,Cordless', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Blade Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Head Type': 'Rotary', 'Package Dimensions': '7.36 x 3.82 x 2.6 inches; 8.78 Ounces', 'UPC': '738629925151', 'Manufacturer': 'MDDM'} Review Text: [[VIDEOID:f269f4bbb908ea03a9ffb408f24f4cd3]] This Sunsonic electric shaver for men is simple to use. It comes fully charged. To recharge it, you simply plug the cord into a usb charger and into the shaver. It does not provide a very close shave though. If you prefer a close shave, this may not be the best option for you.

If you are looking for an inexpensive electric shaver to keep in your car or in your office for emergencies, or if you are looking for one to travel with, this is a good option. The shaver also comes with a pop-up trimmer. Simply push a button on the back of the shaver and a trimmer pops up so that you can shave your neck and around ears. See my video for additional details. Review Title: Good emergency backup saver - no close shave Rating: 3.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Brush Strokes Large Ball Tip Rounder Brush (Assorted Colors) Brush Strokes {'Brand': 'Brush Strokes', 'Shape': 'Oblong', 'Special Feature': 'Not-applicable', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Hair Type': 'Fine', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '8.8 x 2.6 x 2.6 inches; 1.6 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SG_B004F0KBDW_US', 'UPC': '794168349933'} Pros: This brush is so light weight and makes it so easy to create a smooth, straight look with your hair. It does not tangle at all and is easy to use.
Cons: The brush made my hair a little flat, but I have thin, fine hair that requires work to create body. Great for smoothing and straightening hair! Cancun Collection Cacao Body Bronzer – Superfood Infused Sunless Tanning Lotion with Cacao 5.1 fl.oz, For Instant Tan in 1 minute. Cancun Collection {'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Cancun Collection', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Material Feature': 'Antioxidant', 'Package Dimensions': '5.1 x 4.6 x 1 inches; 14.39 Ounces', 'UPC': '659436986640'} This Cancun Collection Cacao Bronzer is a fabulous alternative to getting a natural suntan from a tanning bed or from the sun due to harmful UV rays. It is also a great alternative if you do not like using self-tanners that can smell. This applies easily and blends with all skin tones. I have fair skin, but this even works on my skin color too. The bronzer blurs imperfections and stays on until you shower with soap! I recommend this product! See my pictures for more information. Great, natural looking bronzer! MD Complete Bright & Healthy Citrus-C Refresh Retinol + Vitamin C Multitasking Treatment MD Complete by Dr. Brian Zelickson {'Brand': 'MD Complete by Dr. Brian Zelickson', 'Scent': 'Citrus', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Unit Count': '1.0 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 1.25 x 4.5 inches; 2.26 Ounces', 'UPC': '850458005719'} This MD Complete Bright & Healthy serum has all the ingredients recommended to treat fine lines, wrinkles and dull texture (Vitamin C, Vitamin E, Vitamin B, Retinol and Omega-3). However, I did not find this to be moisturizing at all and it actually dried my skin out - making my fine lines and wrinkles more noticeable. The product indicates this product is great for someone in their 20’s or 30’s - maybe that’s true, but this is not an effective product for someone 40+ dealing with aging skin. I cannot recommend this product for aging skin - maybe it’s effective for younger skin to prevent aging 🤷🏼‍♀️ - but it is not restorative if you have aging skin. Not recommended for aging skin 2-Pack Puretize 16.9 Oz Hand Sanitizing Gel w/Pump Tops - Extra Strength 70% Ethyl Alcohol - Moisturizing Formula with Aloe Vera, Vitamin E & Botanical Extracts - Quick Drying Formula Pure Daily Care {'Brand': 'Pure Daily Care', 'Unit Count': '33.8 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Special Feature': 'Moisturizing', 'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Package Dimensions': '7 x 6.5 x 4.5 inches; 1.06 Pounds', 'UPC': '810016711360'} This Puretize I stand hand sanitizer contains 70% ethyl alcohol and is free of dyes and strong perfumes. It has a bit of an alcohol or medicine sent but it is not overpowering. See my picture for a list of ingredients. Even though it is 70% alcohol it did not leave my skin feeling dried out. I think this is a great value for two containers it would be great to use in an office, church, school, or even at home! Overall, I like this product and recommend it! Keeps germs away!!! Sunsonic Electric Razor, Rechargeable Electric Shaver with Pop Up Beard Trimmer, Type-C USB Mens Electric Razor. It comes fully charged. To recharge it, you simply plug the cord into a usb charger and into the shaver. It does not provide a very close shave though. If you prefer a close shave, this may not be the best option for you.

If you are looking for an inexpensive electric shaver to keep in your car or in your office for emergencies, or if you are looking for one to travel with, this is a good option. The shaver also comes with a pop-up trimmer. Simply push a button on the back of the shaver and a trimmer pops up so that you can shave your neck and around ears. See my video for additional details. profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preferences:** 
  - Favors light-weight, efficient grooming tools for ease of use and practicality.
  - Prioritizes functionality in products, especially in smoothing, straightening, and shaving capabilities.
  - Chooses brushes designed to minimize tangling and values versatility in personal care items.
  - Interested in skincare products that yield effective results without harmful chemicals, particularly alternatives to sun exposure.
  - Demonstrates a preference for practical personal care items, like hand sanitizers with moisturizing properties.

- **Hair Type Consideration:** 
  - Selects products formulated for fine hair, mindful of their effects on body and volume.

- **Experience with Products:**
  - Generally satisfied with products, maintaining a positive average rating.
  - Values the balance between product efficacy and individual hair needs; appreciates skincare items that offer natural finishes and simple applications.
  - Growing focus on skin health, hydration, and anti-aging efficacy, alongside convenience.

- **Overall Trends:**
  - Values efficiency and usability in personal grooming tools, seeking quick and effective solutions.
  - Inclined toward products that enhance natural beauty with minimal effort.
  - Exhibits concern for product effectiveness, emphasizing the importance of hydrating formulations that address aging skin concerns.
  - Recent experiences with grooming tools indicate a desire for practical, emergency-ready options rather than those offering the closest results.
